problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following is outside our solar system?|| Select one correct answer.<<
( ) The moon ( ) The International Space Station ( ) The asteroid belt (x) None of the above
[explanation] None of those items are outside our solar system. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which of the following is outside our solar system?

div.p: None of those items are outside our solar system.
